title: Accessibility Problems with Help View
description: I encounter accessibility problems where I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working, such as the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.
OB: On 20020326, using Win2K, when I launch the Help view, the tab key does not actually do anything.
EB: When launching the Help view, the tab key should navigate through the interactive elements without requiring a prior click on a 'live' area.
SR:
1. Open the application on a Win2K system.
2. Navigate to the Help view.
3. Attempt to use the tab key to navigate through the interactive elements.
4. Observe that the tab key does not function as expected.
